title: Four Red Banners
description: The Four Banners Army seems to have vanished into thin air—until a girl named Ariadne happens to stumble upon their secret fortress. Soon she becomes tangled up in the civil war that has inflamed the country. Leading the Four Banners Army is the rightful king, Prince Colan, supported by his brothers. Challenging these heirs to the throne is their own cousin and foster-brother, the Lord Marius. An ambitious young man who has inspired ardent devotion in his soldiers, Marius has taken control of the country and is preparing to crown himself king—unless Colan can defeat this man who, as a boy, was his dearest friend.
author: Gianna Cruz
